alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 25 at 3:48AM MDT until April 26 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 AM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Lake County Below 11000 Feet, Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Feet and La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to 6 AM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; La Garita Mountains Above 10000 Ft; Leadville Vicinity, Lake County Below 11000 Ft
